title: Tom Brady-Bill Belichick, Steelers, & LeBron James
itunes:title: Tom Brady-Bill Belichick, Steelers, & LeBron James
description:
Colin discusses the rift between New England Patriots QB Tom Brady and HC Bill Belichick, why Brady doesn't get the respect he deserves, the continued drama going on with the Pittsburgh Steelers, and why LeBron James will never be the greatest Los Angeles Laker of all-time. Guests include Nick Wright, DeAngelo Hall, Joel Klatt, and Plaxico Burress.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
